Title: c2iGmailNotifier for Windows 7
Description: This small application advise you when you receive email on your Google Gmail account. Full Windows 7 integration.
HomeWiki:
This small application advise you when you receive email on your Google Gmail account. Full Windows 7 integration.

New version: 1.1.0.0 (11/8/09): Check update at start and play sound.
Version: 1.0.0.1 (10/29/09): Adding transparency.


You can find more information about this project on c2i.fr: http://www.c2i.fr/c2iGmailNotifier
